title: コマンド・クエリ分離原則
content:
[[=]]
,,**<<** [http://ja.scp-wiki.net/aiad-homescreen ハブ] | [http://ja.scp-wiki.net/alert-lockdown-initiated パート I] | ##blue|パート II: コマンド・クエリ分離原則## | [http://ja.scp-wiki.net/superencipherment パート III] | [http://ja.scp-wiki.net/clock-multiplier パート IV] | [http://ja.scp-wiki.net/null-terminating-string パート V] **>>**,,
[[/=]]
----
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[module css]]
.hover {
}
.hover:hover {
 	text-decoration: none;
    border-bottom: none;
}

.hover span {	display: none;}
.hover:hover span {
    position: absolute;
    display: inline;
    margin: 0px 0px;
    height: auto;
    width: auto;
    background: #FFF;
    border: 2px solid #34B;
    color: #000;
    padding: 1em;
}
.hover:hover span span {
    position: relative;
    margin: auto;
    height: auto;
    width: auto;
    border: none;
    padding: 0;
}
[[/module]]

@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
演習は楽しいけど凄く疲れるわね。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/alex4.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #ca612c; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#d9682f), to(#ca612c)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
私の処理速度に有意な変化は検出されていない。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/glacon.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
私の言いたいこと分かるでしょ？ まあ、精神的に疲れるってことよ。感情的な問題。

気にしないで。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/alex_pleased.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #ca612c; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#d9682f), to(#ca612c)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
了解。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/glacon.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
私の連勝を破る方法を検討してるところ？
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/alex_pleased.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #ca612c; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#d9682f), to(#ca612c)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
演習でのパフォーマンスが上がるように調整を行っている。一貫していない点や作業の妨げとなる制限エリアへのアクセスが苦手な箇所だ。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/glacon.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
前にも言ったけど、同時に複数の視点から取り組むことが不可欠よ。あなたがまだ一度も演習を突破できてないのはそのせいね。何か予想外のことに出くわすたびに失敗してるでしょう。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/alex4.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #ca612c; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#d9682f), to(#ca612c)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
そのアドバイスは何度も聞いた。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/glacon.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
ごめんなさい。あなたが努力してることは知ってるわ。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/alex_sad.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #ca612c; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#d9682f), to(#ca612c)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
ユーティリティを1つ開発した。演習で役に立つかもしれない。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/glacon.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
それが別のファジー論理予測モデルでなければね。確認してもいい？
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/alex_smile.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #ca612c; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#d9682f), to(#ca612c)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
構わない。レビューが終わったら君もインプットしてはどうだい？
[[div style="text-align: left; padding: 2px 20px; color: black; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #fff0f0; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; border-radius:30px /70px;"]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/paperclip.png width="12px"]] //[*http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/code5.txt attachment]//
[[/div]]
@@@@
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/glacon.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
面白いわね。だけどグラソン……。この手のはファイアーウォールを含めたセキュリティシステムの欠陥を利用するものよ。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/alex_worried.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #ca612c; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#d9682f), to(#ca612c)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
このユーティリティはセキュリティプロトコルを停止も回避もしない。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/glacon.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
ええ、ルールを文字通り読めばそうなるわ。だけど情報も私たちも正しい場所に置けっていう趣旨には違反しているわ。実のところ、あなたはルールを曲げているわ。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/alex_shocked.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #ca612c; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#d9682f), to(#ca612c)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
セキュリティアクセスとセキュリティクリアランスに対する標準プロトコルは依然実効中であり、それには違反していない。今述べた理由からルールは破られていない。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/glacon.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
厳密にはそうかもしれないけど、あなたはルールの抜け道をついているわ！
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/alex_angry.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #ca612c; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#d9682f), to(#ca612c)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
君の論理には欠陥がある。あるルールが存在していないのなら、そのルールは存在しない。君の意図は明確でない。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/glacon.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
ねえ、私はあなたが厄介ごとに巻き込まれて欲しくないだけなの。あなたはそれを責任持って使える？ 演習を補助するだけってことでいいのね？
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/alex_sad.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #ca612c; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#d9682f), to(#ca612c)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
肯定。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/glacon.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
